column2: Genpact Ltd. engages in the business process management, outsourcing, shared services and information outsourcing. The firm's segments include Business process outsourcing and Information technology services. The firm offers various vertical activities, which include banking and financial services; capital markets; insurance; consumer goods and retail; life sciences and healthcare; infrastructure, manufacturing and services, and High Tech. In addition to these vertical activities, it also offers analytics and research, collections and customer services, consulting and transformation services, core industry operations services, enterprise application services, finance and accounting (F&A) services, information technology (IT) infrastructure management services, and supply chain and procurement services.
